front.title: RTP Payload Format for Multi-Flow FEC

abstract.t: This document defines a new RTP payload format for the Forward Error Correction (FEC) that is used to protect multiple source flows. The format defined by this document enables the protection of multiple media sources encapsulated in RTP with one or more repair flows and is based on the FEC framework (described in [I-D.ietf-fecframe- framework]) and the SDP Elements for FEC Framework (described in [I-D.ietf-fecframe-sdp-elements]).
